actionTemplate.title: Light “mixed” liner: connect upper and lower outer corners
steps: Draw a thin upturned wing from the outer corner
Line upper lashes and connect to the wing
Extend the lower outer lash line slightly with a pencil
Join upper and lower lines at the outer corner
Fill gaps and keep the inner corner clean

rationaleTemplate: Connecting upper and lower outer corners makes eyes look bigger
Keeping it thin avoids a heavy, harsh look
